title: A Templar Tale
description: Wilhelm, the Night Stalker (Vampire) hunter is given command of nine poor knights and sent to the Holy Land to destroy a renewed evil. The first Crusade, assisted by the Children of Adam, supposedly destroyed the Stalker menace, however, they were only forced into hiding. Now, almost a hundred years later theyâ€™re back with a new powerful ally, Ilghazi the Turkman and his Islamic army. With dozens of Night Stalkers and an Islamic army threatening the entire Holy Land. Wilhelm, and a hand full of knights must trust a mysterious stranger to aid in their desperate fight. At the climatic Battle of the Field of Blood, Hunters and Stalkers will fight to the death.
author: Lon Widdicombe
